name: Kaleidoscope - Automatic Rotoscoping on the Web
summary: Kaleidoscope is a web based application that Rotoscopes (redraws a video frame by frame) in different styles. For example, the video below rotoscopes a video into the style of Claude Monet. The computational complexity of the Generative AI model we used necessitated management through Amazons Kubernetes Service (EKS).
skills: AWS, Kubernetes, Generative AI, Web Development
